recipients.description: Enter recipient emails to receive form notifications, separated by commas.

hide_root.description: Enable this option to hide the root link in breadcrumbs.

hide_current.description: Enable this option to hide the current link in breadcrumbs.

slides_per_view.description: Set the maximum number of slides per view, adjusting automatically based on screen and container size.

meta_description.description: Leave blank if you wish to use the site default.

lazy.description: For images positioned below the main fold, consider enabling lazy loading to enhance page performance.

size.description: Defines a maximum width for larger screens; the image will automatically resize to fit smaller screens & containers.

padding_top.description: Toggle to add top padding to the section component.

padding_bottom.description: Toggle to add bottom padding to the section component.

cookies_enabled.description: Note: If your website uses cookies for tracking or other purposes, obtaining prior user consent is required.

secondary_logo.description: Alternate logo version designed specifically for optimal visibility on dark backgrounds.

thumbnail.description: Leave this blank to use the default YouTube thumbnail.
